name: @tensorworks/spstypescriptexample
description: The typescript example for consuming the Scalable Pixel Streaming Frontend

scripts.build-all-dev: cd ../../library && npm install && npm run build-dev && cd ../examples/typescript && npm run symlink && npm run build-dev
scripts.build-all-prod: cd ../../library && npm install && npm run build-prod && cd ../examples/typescript && npm run symlink && npm run build-prod

author: TensorWorks Pty Ltd
